memory
Class MemoryBoardZP

java.lang.Object
  memory.MemoryBoard
      memory.MemoryBoardZP
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnvironment, IEnvironmentTwoPlayers, java.io.Serializable
public class MemoryBoardZP
extends MemoryBoard

The version studied by Zwick and Patterson,where they try to maximize the number of cards. Compared to MemoryBoard, only the getReward method changes.

Author:
Francesco De Comite
See Also:
MemoryBoard, Serialized Form
